{{Infobox command
|name=bossbar
|oplevel=2
}}
Creates, modifies and lists bossbars.

== Syntax ==
:<code>bossbar add <id> <name></code>
::Create a new bossbar (stored in [[Java_Edition_level_format#level.dat_format|level.dat]] <code>CustomBossEvents</code>).
:<code>bossbar get <id> (max|players|value|visible)</code>
::Return the requested setting as a <code>result</code> of the command.
:<code>bossbar list</code>
::Display a list of existing bossbars.
:<code>bossbar remove <id></code>
::Remove an existing bossbar.
:<code>bossbar set <id> (color|max|name|players|style|value|visible)</code>
::<code>... color (blue|green|pink|purple|red|white|yellow)</code>
:::Set the text color (if no color was specified as part of a text component) and bar color. Defaults to <code>white</code> upon creation.
::<code>... max <max></code>
:::Set the bossbar's maximum value. Defaults to <code>100</code> upon creation.
::<code>... name <name></code>
:::Set the bossbar's name.
::<code>... players [<targets>]</code>
:::Change the set of players to whom the bar is visible. Defaults to none upon creation.
::<code>... style (notched_6|notched_10|notched_12|notched_20|progress)</code>
:::Set the bossbar's visual amount of segments: continuous, 6 segments, 10 segments, 12 segments, or 20 segments. Defaults to <code>progress</code> upon creation.
::<code>... value <value></code>
:::Set the bossbar's current value. Defaults to <code>0</code> upon creation.
::<code>... visible <visible></code>
:::Set the bossbar's visibility. Defaults to <code>true</code> upon creation.

== Arguments ==
{{argument|id|resource_location}}
: Specifies a unique bossbar.
: {{arg desc|je=resource_location}}

{{argument|name|component}}
: Specifies the display name of the bossbar.
: {{arg desc|je=component}}

{{argument|max|integer}}
: Specifies the bossbar's maximum value.
: {{arg desc|je=integer|min=1}}

{{argument|targets|entity}}
: Specifies the set of players to whom the bar is visible.
: If not specified, the boss bar is invisible to any player.
: {{arg desc|je=entity|amount=multiple|type=players}}

{{argument|value|integer}}
: Specifies the bossbar's current value.
: {{arg desc|je=integer|min=0}}

{{argument|visible|bool}}
: Specifies the bossbar's visibility.
: {{arg desc|je=bool}}
